com.sails.map.core.model

Class GeoPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sails.map.core.model.GeoPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GeoPoint>

    public class GeoPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<GeoPoint>, java.io.Serializable
    A GeoPoint represents an immutable pair of latitude and longitude coordinates.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      The longitude coordinate of this GeoPoint in degrees.

    • Method Detail

      • fromString

        public static GeoPoint fromString(java.lang.String geoPointString)
        Creates a new GeoPoint from a comma-separated string of coordinates in the order latitude, longitude. All coordinate values must be in degrees.
        Parameters:
        geoPointString - the string that describes the GeoPoint.
        Returns:
        a new GeoPoint with the given coordinates.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the string cannot be parsed or describes an invalid GeoPoint.

      • latitudeDistance

        public static double latitudeDistance(int meters)
        Calculates the amount of degrees of latitude for a given distance in meters.
        Parameters:
        meters - distance in meters
        Returns:
        latitude degrees

      • longitudeDistance

        public static double longitudeDistance(int meters,
                       double latitude)
        Calculates the amount of degrees of longitude for a given distance in meters.
        Parameters:
        meters - distance in meters
        latitude - the latitude at which the calculation should be performed
        Returns:
        longitude degrees
